Description: Sketches of four scenes: a horseman before a crucifixion, a group of horsemen, a man, and three men near a horse Red chalk Verso: Two battle scenes with horsemen Red chalk
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Samuel Woodburn (Christie's, 4.vi.1860/part of lot 25 'The rest in Egypt, MASTELLETTA; and various', 12 in the lot, bt Phillipps £1-1-0)
